website_summaries.verdict: Danner bootmakers have crafted something magnificently eye-catching in the Mountain Pass. Its mesmerizing aesthetics, thankfully, is coupled with an amount of comfort that exceeds expectations. This thing of beauty is also outstandingly light and requires a very minimal break-in period.That said, this Danner hiking boot took a beating for its underperforming insole. To sum up, Danner’s Mountain Pass is hard to ignore, not with its blend of great qualities overpowering its workable downsides.
pros: Professional footwear reviewers couldn’t help but adore the Mountain Pass’ amazing level of comfort
Dozens of Danner fans have expressed their deep admiration for the boot’s outstandingly beautiful looks
This day hiker has received great ratings from shoe critics for being fantastically lightweight
According to several owners, they don't need to break in this boot at all
Less than a handful of wearers are quite amazed at the dependable waterproofing of this boot
An expert footwear reviewer gives the Mountain Pass a thumbs-up for its remarkable durability
Some owners feel right at home with the default wide fit of this gear
cons: The boot’s footbed has been immediately dismissed by a video blogger, calling it too plain and uninspiring

customer_reviews.title: Squeaking heel
customer_reviews.text: Boots are light weight, comfortable, size was correct. But developed a really annoying squeak in the left heel after about ten months of regular wear (not worn as a work boot). Danner support suggested removing insole, checking shank (was not loose); didn't help. Replaced sole, which also didn't help. Return for repair looks like a hassle -- you pay to insure and send boots to repair facility where they are "evaluated;" definitely not a no questions asked warrantty. Squeak doesn't affect comfort but would interfere with any activity that depends on being quiet on the trail (like wildlife photography, hunting, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Sidney M

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size up, great boots.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of dancers, the first being the tramline and second being the mountain light 2. Im not sure of the lasts but the tramline (503 last) i believe fit perfect .5 size under my actual size. The Mountain lights fit perfect .5 above my actual size. I read somewhere that these fit "true to size" but true to size was much too narrow/short for me even in EE width. If you normally wear a 11.5 EE i would suggest going with the 12 EE. Great boots just like the others i have from Danner. It actually happened that the "amazon recommended size" was correct in this case.
customer_reviews.author: spender

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality boot. I went up a 1/2 size do to a wide foot. Fit perfect! I would have given a five-star but the tread is not very deep and they are a little bit laxed for traction. But they are one of the most comfortable boots I've ever had. And lightweight you could easily walk 10 miles in them with no problem! Very easy to break in, my feet never really hurt during the break in of a couple days. I have had them about two months now and they fit like a glove.. hopefully I can get a few good years life out of them. And then I could resell them.
customer_reviews.author: Cman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of boots in quite some time. Look great, comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Yes and not so much.
customer_reviews.text: These boots look great, in a big fan of the style. From a fit perspective, I find them a bit snug around the top of my foot. Perhaps after a proper wear in, the leather might get a bit more pliable they won’t feel as constricting. Thick socks will make it worse for now.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Scott Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots. Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful boots. I chose to go with the same size that I wear in atheletic shoes, worked out great for me. Amazon prime, price, all on point. Danner is the real deal. Quality is as good as the Zamberlans that I have owned without question.
customer_reviews.author: QC

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable boots i have tried - laces provided could be ...
customer_reviews.text: most comfortable boots i have tried - laces provided could be a bit longer, but the construction of the boot and the fit are outstanding - worth the extra money for a sturdy, well made boot
customer_reviews.author: Casey Matthew Calkins

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots. Even the EE is not very wide..
customer_reviews.text: Fits narrow even for the size EE I ordered. Quality is excellent however and am hoping I can break these boots in! Will look for lower profile inserts to add some room to the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great, but the shoelace is flawed. @inspector No.105 & 108 ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ashell

customer_reviews.title: order a half size up...
customer_reviews.text: runs a little bit small, so that a really thick sock would make it tight. a little more room in the toe would make this ideal. finish is great. i've worn these all day with no issues of tired feet. I have flat feet, so I find shoes with extreme arch supports to be uncomfortable - I have no problem with these boots. Have received several compliments on their look.
customer_reviews.author: gd

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the boot
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the boot, the fit is a little small and there feels like there is a bump under the balls of my feet. But that maybe be from the size being a little small
customer_reviews.author: joseph selitto

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, slightly small around the pinkie toe. Leather has stretched slightly which has made for a snug fit. Waterproof, great hiking/work boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like them a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these shoes! The size runs slightly large in terms of length. Width is a good fit. Might initially be slightly rigid and uncomfortable, but this is to be expected by any fine leather boots. Once broken in, they feel great, and again, look great. Have yet to test them on a hike, but have walked around for miles and they felt very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After years of wanting....
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY! I have them. Finally, after years of wanting (you can't buy these in Belgium), I have a pair of Danners. I only wore them for 5 minutes, but they feel like I've worn them all my life. Fits great with very thin socks, but also very good with thick woolen socks. It's like magic! Got them in 9 EE, which is like 43 EU. Gonna love these babies, and take them on a hike as soon as I get back!
customer_reviews.author: Bagbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Go up at least half size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots, just a little too small (length). The width for a EE was narrow, but comfortable. I'm going half a size up next time.
customer_reviews.author: E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Athletic fit for sure
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11.5 EE Danner Mountain Trail and was recommended to order that size. Reading how the M Pass is an "athletic fit" I opted for a size 12. They turned out to be a snug/short 12 (tried them on with thin socks). Too bad because Amazon and Danner are sold out in 13. These are definitely a light trail/city boot with Danner quality all over them.
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is very satisfied, the shoe sole prop up is very good
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very satisfied, the shoe sole prop up is very good, the appearance is very fond of
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, just need to find the right size... It seems running a bit smaller...
customer_reviews.author: Leonid Shiriaev

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots are broken in already and can't beat the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would happily pay full price to get another pair
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason these carry the price tag they do. Phenomenal shoes. Held up well to traipsing around the Scottish highlands, and kept my feet dry even though I took a few missteps into bogs. They're not "waterproof", but leather is naturally water resistant, and even held up to standing and walking in streams. I got these during the prime sale, and knowing what I know now, I would happily pay full price to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to go backpacking!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Danner Hiking boots, and I love everything about them! They look and fit amazing. I never write reviews on anything, but these deserve it. Love my Danners more than my Redwing boots
customer_reviews.author: alaina costa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: They stink. Not waterproof and traction isn’t great. $300+ boot that fits too tight, no support, and goretex that isn’t waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Payan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Purchased during Black Friday sale and received 30% ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Purchased during Black Friday sale and received 30% additional discount. Very well made, quality boots.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Ruklic

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable footbed. The leather is taking a little to ...
customer_reviews.text: Have only had a few weeks and mostly wearing about 3 days a week. Very comfortable footbed. The leather is taking a little to get use to since I'm not wearing full time yet. They feel great on my feet otherwise and can wear all day in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: jason wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Boots are amazing. They are my everyday shoes. Feet well and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Johnson

product_meta.title: Danner Mens 33275 Mountain Pass
product_meta.description: Whether hiking the pacific northwest trails or exploring new cities, the mountain pass offers versatility, lightweight functionality, and style. Featuring our traditional stitchdown construction with a full-grain leather upper and 100 percent waterproof gore-tex lining, the mountain pass has a removable footbed and is 25 percent lighter than the original mountain light. Outsole is Vibram Kletterlift Thin.
feature_bullets: Durable hiking boot featuring D-ring lacing and debossed logos on tongue and side
